content: I appreciate your initial offer, but I think 1350 Euro per month is a bit too high for me. I am a student and I am looking for something more affordable. How about 950 Euro per month?

content: As Peter Schmidt, reluctant but trying to maintain an air of control over the negotiation, I respond: 'I understand your situation Haoyu Wang, but this apartment is in substantial demand due to its prime location. However, if you firmly commit to a one-year lease term, I might consider lowering the price to 1150 Euro per month. But please note, this is a one-time concession.' This way, I've lowered the price a bit but sought a longer commitment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my situation. However, 1150 Euro per month is still too high for me. I am willing to sign a one-year lease term, but 950 Euro per month would be more affordable for me.

content: Frustrated but trying to keep up the negotiation, Peter Schmidt says: 'Haoyu Wang, I'm disappointed as I've made a significant compromise already. This way, I've lowered the price further but still tried to maintain control over a potential rent hike after the lease term.
